name: Pair of Corner Cupboards
maker: Carcass and mounts attributed to Jean-Pierre Latz, Marquetry panels attributed to the Workshop of Jean-François Oeben
description: Pair of Corner Cupboards; Carcass and mounts attributed to Jean-Pierre Latz (French, about 1691 - 1754), Marquetry panels attributed to the Workshop of Jean-François Oeben (French, born Germany, 1721 - 1763, master 1761); Paris, France; about 1750 - 1755; Oak veneered with amaranth, stained sycamore, boxwood, and rosewood; gilt-bronze mounts; breche d'Alep top; 72.DA.39; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Pair of Corner Cupboards
medium: Oak veneered with amaranth, stained sycamore, boxwood, and rosewood; gilt-bronze mounts; breche d'Alep top
